articles.title: Mark Cuban backs Skylight, a TikTok alternative built on Bluesky’s underlying technology - TechCrunch
articles.description: Mark Cuban has backed Skylight, a TikTok alternative built on Bluesky's underlying technology.
articles.content: Skylight, a startup taking on TikTok with a more open alternative, is launching its mobile app to the public on Tuesday after just 10 weeks of active development. The app, which is backed by Mark Cub… [+3446 chars]
